about_the_game:
Wanna My Incubi Harem scenes (the NSFW and SFW ones) in your pocket as well as check the backstage of the game?


This pack contains My Incubi Harem scenes and a PDF document with the backstage of the game (in terms of art). You'll be able to check how we created the characters, their sketches, and some mistakes we made. In other words, you'll get:

  • A folder with all scenes in the original resolution (1920x1080 or more);
  • A PDF document with the backstage of the game including sketches from the scenes, characters' art process, art mistakes, and much more!

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\My Incubi Harem\Adult Art Pack

content_descriptors.notes: My Incubi Harem - Adult Art Pack contains partial and full nudity, explicit male homosexual sex (oral and anal).
